title: OpenAI’s Ilya Sutskever Has a Plan for Keeping Super-Intelligent AI in Check
description: The “superalignment” team led by OpenAI chief scientist Ilya Sutskever has devised a way to guide the behavior of AI models as they get ever smarter.

title: Inside Mark Zuckerberg’s Top-Secret Hawaii Compound
description: Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg is building a sprawling, $100 million compound in Hawaii—complete with plans for a huge underground bunker. A WIRED investigation reveals the true scale of the project—and its impact on the local community.
